short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A saving tool to save meanings of the words searched on google

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save the words from google meanings to your personal space and practice them on the go.
VocaBro lets you save meanings of the words from Google to add it to your digital storage for future reference.

🔍 Search for meaning of words
💾 Save them with VocaBro
🔀 Jumbled saved words appear in flashcard format in your new tab page
🤔 Guess the meaning and shuffle through the words
🏃‍♀️ View all words to practice them all in one go
✨ Remember new words in an improved way and expand your vocabulary with VocaBro
